name: GCPBoleh Cloud Challenge (Season 5)
organization: Google Developer Groups (GDG Cloud KL) / Google Cloud
contribution: Completed the online self-study program focused on Google Cloud technologies.

Gained hands-on experience in creating and managing cloud resources, automating infrastructure, and deploying applications.

Developed serverless applications using Firebase, including authentication, database management, storage, and hosting.
Engaged in a Google Cloud challenge focused on bracketology and data analysis for NCAA® March Madness®.

name: H2O Splashmania
